summary: The mod adds a new companion into the game, an altmer Necromancer known as Xavier.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://s006.radikal.ru/i214/1406/8a/34e2f275d375.png[/img]
[img]http://i017.radikal.ru/1406/e6/fee2108ddab4.png[/img]

[img]http://s017.radikal.ru/i401/1502/a0/8d2e47f2d5b2.jpg[/img]
[url=http://elven-nazi.deviantart.com/art/Xavier-513912443]Xavier[/url] by [url=http://elven-nazi.deviantart.com/]ElvenNazi[/url]

The mod adds a new companion into the game, an altmer Necromancer known as Xavier. He is a standalone, immortal follower.
[s]Xavier does not support marriage.[/s]
Xavier supports marriage now.
He is a Conjuration master and balanced to ensure that your character still gets a fair share of opponents to slay and is able to level up properly.
Xavier wonâ€™t trigger traps in dungeons.
He also has his own unique set of equipment and spells.
[b]Requirements:[/b]
Skyrim version 1.9.32.0
DLC Dawnguard
[color=#20124D]
[/color][color=#20124D][size=4]V. 2.3: [/size][/color]
Added new spell - Double Fang (summon two armored death hounds).
New staff enchantment (soul trap).

[color=#20124D][size=4]V. 3.0:[/size][/color]
[size=2]- New summonable creatures (unique zombies and corrupted shades)
- Added a hood with Xavier's hairstyle. This hood will be automatically unequipped in interiors and equipped outdoors.
- Having character level 40 and 100 in Conjuration skill, Xavier can summon a skeletal dragon named Foluntoor to help him.
(Dragon can't be summoned in interiors)
- All Xavier's spells and spells/shouts of summoned creatures no longer damage the player.
- Summoned creatures no longer attack the player.
- Changed Xavier's staff sound effect to be more quiet.
- Added high poly head instead of the old one.
- Fixed eyelids bug with custom fov.
- Various minor fixes.
- Cleaned the mod with TES5Edit.
[/size]

[img]http://s020.radikal.ru/i710/1406/00/344a1701dfb7.png[/img]
Xavier can be found in Morthal, where he bides his time in Moorside Inn.

[img]http://s004.radikal.ru/i208/1406/c6/755c81ea2e04.png[/img]
(Manually)
Place mod's files to your Data folder. Activate XavierNecromancerFollower.esp in the game launcher.
[img]http://i058.radikal.ru/1406/c0/1b4c052c8870.png[/img]
(Manually)
Dismiss Xavier as your follower. Save game.
Then remove files from following folders
-XavierNecromancerFollower.esp
-meshes/XAVIER
-meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/XavierNecromancerFollower.esp
-textures/XAVIER
-textures/actors/character/facegendata/FaceTint/XavierNecromancerFollower.esp

[img]http://s005.radikal.ru/i210/1406/97/881520665212.png[/img]
Bethesda for Skyrim
Chris57 and FavoredSoul for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?] Male body [/url]
Geonox for [url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?] High Res Face Maps for Men[/url]
Urshi for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145/?] Smooth Male Body textures[/url]
His subcredit list includes:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/320142]Imperator3[/url] - for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19159]Mens Underwear replacer[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/813611]neovinci[/url] - meshes,
and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/535888]BaronDavid[/url] - textures.
Apachii for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?] Hair [/url]
Hvergelmir for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?] Brows [/url]
Newermind43 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23165/?] Avatar of Grenth armor set [/url]
Noodles for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?] Cloak mesh[/url]
ElaNeith for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54118/?] Warpaint[/url]
My friends [url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1932308/?]Aisaka[/url], [url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6879930/?] jesusoden[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5275607/?] redtox [/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13098480/?]Nevernis[/url] for screenshots and test.
Dragonporn and tumbajamba for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50365/?] Double Fang spell[/url]
ViewtifulFlo for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34460/?] Vampire Dogs retexture[/url]
Erik for HighPoly Heads
[url=http://elven-nazi.deviantart.com/]ElvenNazi[/url] for her beautiful art for mod's description design.

[img]http://s43.radikal.ru/i101/1406/b0/e3f8b28f6599.png[/img][/center]
author: Nightshade

files.name: Xavier Necromancer Follower_Eng
files.changelogHtml:
Added offensive Bats spell and Vampiric grip
Included my own custom retex for the Bats to be really black (replacer for Vanilla color).
Deleted Shadow warrior perk, because of the NPC eyes bug.
Fixed head geometry and sliders.

files.name: Xavier Necromancer Follower_Rus
files.changelogHtml:
Added offensive Bats spell and Vampiric grip
Included my own custom retex for the Bats to be really black (replacer for Vanilla color).
Deleted Shadow warrior perk, because of the NPC eyes bug.
Fixed head geometry and sliders.

files.name: Xavier Necromancer Follower_Eng
files.changelogHtml:
Changed Xavier's staff enchantment for Vanilla Vaermina stuff enchantment to a custom Drain and Soultrap enchantment.
Added Double Fang spell (Xavier now can summon two armored Death hounds to help him).
Added another never nude body instead of the old one.
Revorked the body textures.

files.name: Xavier Necromancer Follower_Rus
files.changelogHtml:
Changed Xavier's staff enchantment for Vanilla Vaermina stuff enchantment to a custom Drain and Soultrap enchantment.
Added Double Fang spell (Xavier now can summon two armored Death hounds to help him).
Added another never nude body instead of the old one.
Revorked the body textures.

files.name: Xavier Necromancer Follower_Eng
files.changelogHtml:
New summonable creatures (unique zombies and corrupted shades)

Added a hood with Xavier's hairstyle. This hood will be automatically unequipped in interiors and equipped outdoors.

Having character level 40 and 100 in Conjuration skill, Xavier can summon a skeletal dragon named Foluntoor to help him. (Dragon can't be summoned in interiors)

All Xavier's spells and spells/shouts of summoned creatures no longer damage the player.

Summoned creatures no longer attack the player.

Changed Xavier's staff sound effect to be more quiet.

Added high poly head instead of the old one.

Fixed eyelids bug with custom fov.

Various minor fixes.

Cleaned the mod with TES5Edit.
